# What's New in .NET Standard

> Version history and new features in .NET Standard, the formal API specification for cross-platform compatibility. .NET Standard 2.1 is the final version; new development should target .NET 5+ directly. Libraries targeting .NET Standard 2.0 work on .NET Core, .NET Framework 4.6.1+, and Xamarin.

- [What's new in .NET Standard](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/whats-new/whats-new-in-dotnet-standard.md): This article summarizes new features and enhancements found in each new version of .NET Standard.
